link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt http://www.xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt-2005.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/instance http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-instance-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/XLink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xl-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xlink-2003-12-31.xsd

gen:link.msg:message: Company's financial year end date must be greater than Company's financial year start date
Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan Syarikat mestilah lebih besar daripada tarikh mula tahun kewangan Syarikat
Company's financial year start date is MUST be reported.
Tarikh mula tahun kewangan syarikat MESTI dilaporkan.
Company's financial year end date is MUST be reported
Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan Syarikat MESTI dilaporkan
If filer selects option as "EA6" from "Type of submission" THEN "Status of company" should be "Public company".
Jika pemfail memilih pilihan sebagai "EA6" daripada "Jenis serahan" KEMUDIAN "Status syarikat" hendaklah "Public Company".
Reason for extension of time MUST be reported.
Sebab pelanjutan masa MESTI dilaporkan.
Type of extension of time application MUST be reported.
Jenis permohonan pelanjutan masa MESTI dilaporkan.
When filer selects option as "Change financial year end" from "Reason for Extension of time" THEN "Company's new financial year end date" MUST be reported.
Apabila pemfail memilih "Change financial year end" daripada "Sebab pelanjutan masa" KEMUDIAN "tarikh akhir tahun kewangan baharu Syarikat" MESTI dilaporkan.
When user selects "Type of extension of time application" as "Circulation of financial statements" THEN "Proposed date on which financial statements and reports will be circulated" MUST be reported.
Apabila pengguna memilih "Jenis permohonan pelanjutan masa" sebagai "Circulation of financial statements" KEMUDIAN "Cadangan tarikh penyata kewangan dan laporan akan diedarkan" MESTI dilaporkan.
Previous date of annual general meeting MUST be reported.
Tarikh mesyuarat agung tahunan sebelum ini MESTI dilaporkan.
When filer selects option as "Other reasons" from "Reason for Extension of time" THEN "Description of reason for extension to holding annual general meeting" MUST be reported
Apabila pemfail memilih "Other reasons" daripada "Sebab Pelanjutan masa" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sebab pelanjutan untuk mengadakan mesyuarat agung tahunan" MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA6" and $V1 eq "Other reasons") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA6" and $V1 eq "Other reasons")

gen:link.msg:message: When user selects "Type of extension of time application" as "Annual general meeting of financial statements" THEN "Proposed date for the extension of annual general meeting" MUST be reported.
Apabila pengguna memilih "Jenis permohonan pelanjutan masa" sebagai "Annual general meeting of financial statements" KEMUDIAN "Cadangan tarikh pelanjutan mesyuarat agung tahunan" MESTI dilaporkan.

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA6" and $V1 eq "Annual general meeting of financial statements") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA6" and $V1 eq "Annual general meeting of financial statements")

gen:link.msg:message: Date of submission should be within 6 months from "Company's financial year end date"
Tarikh serahan hendaklah dalam tempoh 6 bulan dari "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan syarikat"
If filer selects option as "Other reasons" from "Reason for extension of time" THEN "Company's new financial year end date" IS NOT applicable
Apabila pemfail memilih pilihan "Other reasons" daripada "Sebab pelanjutan masa" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan baharu syarikat" TIDAK terpakai

When user selects "Type of extension of time application" as "Annual general meeting of financial statements" THEN "Proposed date on which financial statements and reports will be circulated" IS NOT applicable.

Apabila pengguna memilih "Jenis permohonan pelanjutan masa" sebagai "Annual general meeting of financial statements" KEMUDIAN "Cadangan tarikh penyata kewangan dan laporan akan diedarkan" TIDAK terpakai.
When user selects "Type of extension of time application" as "Circulation of financial statements" THEN "Proposed date for the extension of annual general meeting" IS NOT applicable.
Apabila pengguna memilih "Jenis permohonan pelanjutan masa" sebagai "Circulation of financial statements" KEMUDIAN "Cadangan tarikh pelanjutan mesyuarat agung tahunan" TIDAK terpakai.
